overview: Josh Eliot's Big Budget follow-up to one of William Higgin's most popular titles. Big Guns 2 features a cast of 19 hot & hung military studs. Hairy Catalina Exclusive Ray Harley steals the show when he takes on several intruder's with gas masks on their faces and d entry on their minds! Beautifully shot and edited this modern day classic will never lose it's impact!
title: Big Guns 2
